description.value:
This magical matrix records the consciousness, thoughts, and soul of a necrovite and also grants a limited form of telepathy. Such augmented psychic awareness is key to the process of preserving a necrovite's memories when their body is destroyed, including memories of whatever caused their destruction.

When a necrovite is destroyed, electroencephalon begins rebuilding their their physical form over the next 1d10 days. Not even disintegrating a necrovite's corpse can fully destroy the creature. The necrovite's new body manifests next to the electroencephalon, fully healed but without any equipment from their old body.

A standard electroencephalon is a piece of complex magitech about the size of a comm unit that has been constructed via occult means. This device typically has Hardness 10 and 40 HP.
